name: places/ChIJ-fPRZidawokR0mvmLODfBuw
adrFormatAddress: 82 Bowery, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
I recently purchased a beautiful chain necklace from oro Latino , that I cannot recommend enough. Not only did I find the perfect piece of jewelry, but the customer service I received was outstanding.

Hands down best jewelry shop in nyc . Tommy and staff very professional , the hospitality is like no other .

I have been coming here for years .

The necklace itself is a delicate and dainty chain, perfect for layering or wearing alone as a statement piece. The quality of the chain is exceptional, and I can tell that it will last me for years to come. The clasp is easy to use, and the length of the chain is just right.

What really set this jewelry store apart was the level of customer service I received. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted warmly and made to feel at home. I was given personalized attention as I browsed through the selection of jewelry, and the staff was more than happy to answer any questions I had.

When I expressed interest in the necklace I ended up purchasing, the staff member helping me took the time to explain the different materials and styles available, and helped me make an informed decision. She even went above and beyond by suggesting ways to care for my new necklace to ensure it stays looking beautiful for as long as possible.

prices of Gold fluctuate so prices also change . But you will get the best prices in town .

Overall, I am beyond satisfied with both my purchase and the customer service I received at this jewelry store. I would highly recommend them to anyone in

originalText.text: Tommy and his staff will definitely take care of you. From quality, price, and service. It’s definitely A1! You’ll feel welcomed right from the get when you step into the building. I always gotta visit him whenever I fly into NYC. Also if you need recommendations on food from fine dining to hole in the wall spots. That’s the man to ask!

text.text: Tommy and his staff will definitely take care of you. From quality, price, and service. It’s definitely A1! You’ll feel welcomed right from the get when you step into the building. I always gotta visit him whenever I fly into NYC. Also if you need recommendations on food from fine dining to hole in the wall spots. That’s the man to ask!

originalText.text: Oro Latino has been a part of my family for over 20 years. From Sweet 15's to weddings to christenings. They not only have the best prices but also great quality and amazing customer service! You get treated as family.

text.text: Oro Latino has been a part of my family for over 20 years. From Sweet 15's to weddings to christenings. They not only have the best prices but also great quality and amazing customer service! You get treated as family.

originalText.text: What a great spot! I stopped in on my recent trip to NYC to get a name plate necklace. Lots of font and chain options. Everyone working was super helpful and gave great advice. I couldn't be happier with the necklace. I was having the necklace shipped to me, they sent text messages with pictures/updates and it arrived just 1 week later! Thank you!!

text.text: What a great spot! I stopped in on my recent trip to NYC to get a name plate necklace. Lots of font and chain options. Everyone working was super helpful and gave great advice. I couldn't be happier with the necklace. I was having the necklace shipped to me, they sent text messages with pictures/updates and it arrived just 1 week later! Thank you!!

originalText.text: The perfect pendent I was looking for at such a great price for 14k gold. 10/10 recommend if you’re looking for great service, prices, and quality!

text.text: The perfect pendent I was looking for at such a great price for 14k gold. 10/10 recommend if you’re looking for great service, prices, and quality!
